parsedComplaintsResult.impact: A loose alternator can cause the belt to wear prematurely, leading to engine stalling, and potentially resulting in an accident or leaving the driver stranded. Additionally, the failure of the alternator and bracket can cause electrical system malfunctions, affecting vehicle safety and performance.
symptoms: The alternator is loose
the alternator bolt is damaged
the alternator and bracket are damaged
the serpentine belt is worn or damaged
the engine stalls or has difficulty starting.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the air conditioning compressor can cause the air conditioning system to malfunction, leading to reduced cooling performance, increased engine load, and potentially overheating the engine.
symptoms: The air conditioning blows warm air
the air conditioning is not cooling properly
the compressor is noisy or making unusual sounds
refrigerant leaks are visible
the compressor is not engaging.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: An engine compartment fire can cause significant damage to the vehicle, potentially leading to a loss of control, accidents, or even fatalities.
symptoms: Smoke or flames visible from the engine compartment
burning smell
engine stalling or loss of power
warning lights or alarms on the dashboard.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the reverse idler gear can cause the transmission to malfunction, leading to difficulty or inability to shift into reverse gear, which can result in accidents or inconvenience.
symptoms: The vehicle has difficulty shifting into reverse gear
the transmission makes unusual noises
the bolt on the reverse idler gear has come loose or fallen off
the vehicle is unable to shift into reverse gear.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Premature Front Tire Wear due to Defective Tie Rod Ends
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Excessive front tire wear can lead to reduced traction, increased stopping distances, and increased risk of tire failure, which can cause accidents or loss of vehicle control.
symptoms: Uneven or excessive wear on the front tires
frequent need for tire replacement
pulling or drifting of the vehicle to one side while driving.
